definitions.definition: A hired strongman , especially working for the underworld .
The member of a group, especially of a gang, charged with keeping dissident members obedient.
A battering ram used by the emergency services for gaining access to locked premises .
A player who physically intimidates or confronts the opposition.
definitions.label_groups: ice hockey , rugby , Australian rules football

secondary_definitions: A hired strongman , especially working for the underworld .
The member of a group, especially of a gang, charged with keeping dissident members obedient.
( UK ) A battering ram used by the emergency services for gaining access to locked premises .
( ice hockey , rugby , Australian rules football ) A player who physically intimidates or confronts the opposition.
